title: Feature: Basic Project Setup
body:
Initialize the Next.js 15 project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS 4.0.

Create the foundational project structure including:
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript configuration
- Tailwind CSS 4.0 setup
- Basic folder structure (app/, components/, lib/, types/)
- ESLint and Prettier configuration
- Initial README with project overview

This is the foundation that all other features will build upon.
